title: BRIEF-Hudson's Bay Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.39
text:
March 28, 2018 / 11:50 AM / Updated 25 minutes ago BRIEF-Hudson's Bay Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.39 Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - Hudson’s Bay Co: 
* HBC REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS 
* HUDSON’S BAY CO - Q4 RETAIL SALES INCREASED 2.1% TO $4.7 BILLION; COMPARABLE SALES DECLINED BY 2.4% 
* HUDSON’S BAY CO QTRLY SAKS FIFTH AVENUE COMPARABLE SALES INCREASED 2.1% 
* HUDSON’S BAY CO - INVENTORY AT END OF Q4 DECLINED BY $9 MILLION COMPARED TO PRIOR YEAR * HUDSON’S BAY CO QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 
* HUDSON’S BAY CO - MANAGEMENT EXPECTS TOTAL CAPITAL INVESTMENTS IN FISCAL 2018, NET OF LANDLORD INCENTIVES, TO BE BETWEEN $450 MILLION AND $500 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
